Address: Villa 253/2128 Phillip Island Road Cowes VIC 3922
Description:
INVESTMENT OPPORTUNITY
An affordable investment opportunity, within the beautiful Ramada Resort located on pristine Phillip Island. An easy 1.5 hour drive from Melbourne. It consists of 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, and a bright and sunny open plan living, dining and kitchen.
This investment opportunity within the Resort will appeal to corporate couples, singles or families looking for a luxurious, relaxing, maintenance free getaway.
The resort offers a cafe/bar, indoor gym, games room and walking trails full of wildlife. Come and take a look and you will not be disappointed.
All of this is within a 2 minute drive to Cowes CBD, beautiful bay beaches and famous surf beaches.

Description:
Brand New Family Entertainer with Two Living and Alfresco!
This fantastic newly built home is certainly one to add to your must have list. With its instant street appeal, a perfect floor plan & on a great family-sized allotment of 400m2 approx, this amazing Metricon home will accommodate all your family's needs.
With spacious open plan living that features a stone benchtop kitchen with 900mm stainless steel appliances and a walk-in pantry overlooks a sundrenched dining & family area is only the beginning of what this home has to offer. A large private master bedroom, with ensuite & walk-in-robe, is separated completely from the other 3 bedrooms with BIR's ensuring plenty of parental privacy with the added bonus of a 2nd living room, sparkling central bathroom, laundry room and a alfresco area leading into a low maintenance garden that's perfect to entertain family and friends equating to a great family home.
Loaded with quality extras including a double remote garage with internal access, dishwasher, roller blinds, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, solar gas boosted hot water service, LED downlights to entry & living areas, letterbox, clothesline, alarm & professionally landscaped gardens all around.
This amazing package is well located close to Highlands Shopping Centre, Highlands Hotel, local shops & suitable for families with primary school, Newbury Child & Community Centre & beautiful parks with walking tracks all close by. Don't miss out on this sensational offering, call today!
Please Note: Private inspections only.
Please contact the selling agent to make an appointment.

Buy, Relax And Enjoy!
Located in the popular Highlands estate, this young family home is perfect for a first home buyer or keen investor. Comprising of master bedroom with ensuite and walk in robe, 3 additional bedrooms with built in robes, well-appointed kitchen with stainless steel appliances and dishwasher, spacious formal lounge, main bathroom with bathtub and much more. Additional features including ducted heating, double lock up garage with remote control access, low maintenance front and back gardens and the list goes on. Situated in close by to the Stocklands Shopping centre, local schools, parklands and walk trails, public transport and more this one should not be missed. Call Now To Arrange An Inspection.

Description:
Convenient Family Living
Nestled in a blissfully quiet family-friendly location, this updated 4 bedroom home is sure to impress with it's immaculate presentation and free-flowing design.
Bathed in natural light, this much loved home showcases a master bedroom with french-door entry (private ensuite & WIR), 3 additional bedrooms (all with BIR), stylish family bathroom, separate formal lounge, gourmet kitchen with glass splashback and impressive bench space, along with a spacious light-filled open-plan dining area and adjoining family room.
Step outside to discover great outdoor space which includes a covered pergola perfect for all-seasons entertaining, and large grass area fabulous for kids/pets to enjoy.
Other highlights include: ducted heating, split-system air conditioning, alarm system, double remote garage, drive-through access, established gardens and more.
Perfectly located, and only moments from Hanson Road buses, Malcolm Creek walking/cycling trails with acres of parkland, it also offers easy access to Pelican Childcare, Craigieburn Primary School, Medical Centres, Craigieburn Plaza, as well as Craigieburn Station, and the Hume Freeway.
Call now to book your private inspection.

Description:
Spacious Living, Superb Location.....
Here is a wonderful opportunity for the growing family and investors seeking modern design and convenience. Nestled in the quiet pockets of Craigieburn this beautifully presented family home will definitely tick all your boxes. Surrounded by an abundance of local amenities such as Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, schools, childcare facilities, restaurants, Splash Aqua Park and Leisure Centre, Hume Library, park lands, transport and much more.
The home offers:
# Over Sized Master Bedroom with WIR
# 3 bedrooms with BIR
# Rumpus/ 5th bedroom
# Massive Open plan (Living | Dining)
# Beautiful Kitchen with stainless steel appliances & walk-in pantry
# Central Bathroom and Toilet
# Separate laundry
# Double lock up Garage
Extra's Include:
# Evaporating Cooling & Ducted Heating
# Dishwasher
# Landscaping
# Alfresco area
# Downlights
Please contact Nada Hanna on 0404 804 542 to arrange your inspection today. Properties with this character & location do not last long. Photo ID will be required at all inspections.
*Harcourts Roxburgh Park Coronavirus Update*
In light of recent events, Harcourts Roxburgh Park have taken the appropriate measures to minimise the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak to our staff, clients and customers. As news concerning the spread of coronavirus continues to unfold, we are no longer conducting open for inspections and kindly ask that you DO NOT attend inspections, if:
* You are feeling unwell
* Have been in contact with someone diagnosed with coronavirus
* Have been in contact with someone who has recently been overseas
* You are under strict self-isolation instructions
* You have tested positive to coronavirus yourself
If attending inspections, please ensure you practice Social Distancing (minimum 1.5 metres) at all times, keeping in mind:
* Our agents will restrict the number of people inspecting the property to one person at any time.
* You refrain from touching surfaces, door handles, cupboards, drawers, walls, etc. when inspecting the property.
We appreciate your co-operation and ask that you please respect the advice and recommendations of the agent when inspecting the property.
DISCLAIMER: All stated dimensions are approximate only. Particulars given are for general information only and do not constitute any representation on the part of the vendor or agent.
Please see the below link for an up-to-date copy of the Due Diligence Check List:
http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Nice layout family home for sale!
18 Tussock Road, Craigieburn
Located in the Highlands Estate, a highly sought-after and award-winning community in Victoria, this 5-bedroom property boasts an impressive 650m2 land size (approx). This is a rare gem for both investors and home-owners!
This double storey residence features:
- A total of 5 spacious bedrooms with plenty of wardrobe space. 2 bedrooms come equipped with en-suites (the master bedroom upstairs and 1 bedroom downstairs)
- Downstairs is a fabulous open-plan dining area connected to the kitchen. This is also complimented by 2 sizeable living areas which can be utilised to fit your personal lifestyle.
-The fully functional modern kitchen is equipped with stainless steel appliances including under bench oven, gas cook top, range hood, dishwasher, bench tops, pantry and plenty of storage space.
- Outside there is an undercover alfresco overlooking the expansive and very well-maintained backyard.
-Upstairs rumpus room which can serve a variety of purposes, such as parties, games room and or any casual use you desire
- Extra features include double remote-control garage with internal access, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, separate laundry, security alarm and many more.
Current tenant is looking for a lease extension. If you are looking to invest, this will secure your rental income throughout the upcoming years. Through careful occupant selection, the current tenants demonstrate a fantastic history of maintaining the property with a high level of hygiene and paying rent on time.
This home is only a few minutes away from the popular Highlands Shopping Centre and other eateries, football grounds and hectares of parks and open spaces with walkways and bike paths.
Be quick! This is the perfect opportunity to upgrade or invest. Call and register your interest now.

Description:
PERIOD STYLE PERFECTION!
In a blissfully quiet family-focused neighbourhood, this freestanding home is sure to leave a lasting impression with its generous design, immaculate presentation & central location to all of Craigieburn's facilities.
Beyond the gorgeous period-inspired facade, discover an impeccable interior comprising 3 bedrooms (master with walk in robe & private ensuite), equally stylish main bathroom & separate WC, light-filled open living/dining area accompanied by a well-appointed kitchen with stainless steel cooking appliances.
Perfect for the all seasons entertainer, step outside and discover an amazing pergola setting, beautifully landscaped gardens and a sense of relief that all the money has been spent on absolutely everything!
Other stand out features include; high ceilings, ducted heating & powerful split-system air-conditioning, full-size laundry, lock up garage and so much more!
Immediate access to a broad range of lifestyle attractions including public transport, popular primary & secondary schools, trails & parkland, as well as Craigieburn Central shopping centre & only a meters away from Craigieburn Golf Club.

Description:
LIMITLESS IMAGINATION & UNLIMITED POTENTIAL
Sahil Kakar & The Eleet are proud to present this very rare, one of a kind opportunity in Craigieburn located close to Mt Ridley View Point, metres away from Hume Anglican Grammar School.
This opportunity provides a lucky buyer 1000sqm (approx) allotment to build a home of your choice and have substantial space for a pool, shed or even a bigger outdoor area for entertainment. Dream homes & a desired location are a rare blend, intertwine that with a prefect rectangular block to unlock this unthinkable potential.
Breathtaking views, remarkable size , amenities & schools nearby will provide any family an ideal lifestyle.
Your cluster will contain spec homes surrounded by beauty, nature & topping it up would be the city skyline.
Inspect this once in a lifetime opportunity to enjoy all the benefits this land and location has to offer.
Other points of interest- 35 Kms to the city, 20 Kms to the airport, 2.5 Kms to highland shopping centre & 3.5 Kms to Craigieburn station.
Contact Sahil On 0401 926 466 to turn your dreams into reality.
Expression of Interest closes on 09/10/20

Description:
A Masterpiece Family Home Built to The Highest Standards!!!
Harcourts Roxburgh Park proudly present's "5 northfield drive, Craigieburn". In the heart of Highlands! Quality, Space and Style are all apparent as you drive up to this unique family home.close to Mt Ridley's array of parks & playgrounds, endless Malcolm Creek trails, Aitken
Boulevard buses & Highlands Shopping Centre, as well as popular schools including Mount Ridley College, Mother Teresa Primary School & Hume Anglican Grammar.
Completed to perfection - this home offers:
- Master Bedroom with Full En-suite and WIR
- 3 Generous Bedrooms with BIR's
- Large Living Zones
- Dinning area
- Breathtaking Kitchen
- Walk In Pantry
- Multiple Kitchens
- Central Bathroom
- Rumpus
-Laundry Room
- Alfresco
- Double Lock Up Garage
Luxury Extra's and Upgrades Include:
- Heating | Cooling
- Remote Garage
- Dishwasher
- Stone Bench Top
- Ducted Vacuum
- LED light
-High ceiling
- Landscaped garden
To book your inspection or discuss this beautiful family home in more detail - please feel free to contact Nada Hanna on 0404 804 542 . Photo ID required for all inspections.
Inspections available 7 days a week.
*Harcourts Roxburgh Park Coronavirus Update*
In light of recent events, Harcourts Roxburgh Park have taken the appropriate measures to minimise the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak to our staff, clients and customers. As news concerning the spread of coronavirus continues to unfold, we are no longer conducting open for inspections and kindly ask that you DO NOT attend inspections, if:
* You are feeling unwell
* Have been in contact with someone diagnosed with coronavirus
* Have been in contact with someone who has recently been overseas
* You are under strict self-isolation instructions
* You have tested positive to coronavirus yourself
If attending inspections, please ensure you practice Social Distancing (minimum 1.5 metres) at all times, keeping in mind:
* Our agents will restrict the number of people inspecting the property to one person at any time.
* You refrain from touching surfaces, door handles, cupboards, drawers, walls, etc. when inspecting the property.
We appreciate your co-operation and ask that you please respect the advice and recommendations of the agent when inspecting the property.

Description:
Stylish Double Story Family Home in Premium Location
Expression of Interest closing by 4th of July by 5.00pm.
Stylish Double Story Family Home in Premium Location
This quality build family home is only 5-year-old and still comes with balance of builders warranty, built designed to live, entertain and enjoy a unique lifestyle with family and friends for years to come, combining modern free flowing floorplan and unparalleled quality, showcasing commanding street presence.
Sitting amongst the finest neighbourhood in a very sought after location close to walking distance to Craigieburn central, local schools, well maintained park lands, health & leisure centres and public transport, this is the perfect home where you want to grow your family.
The notable features are
Large double story home on approx. 460 m2 land
4 bedrooms plus study makes it ideal for a large family.
Spacious kitchen with walk in pantry and 900mm SS appliances
Luxury master suite with access to its own balcony with uninterrupted views of the parkland just opposite the house.
Decked grand alfresco to entertain friends and family for years to come.
Evaporative cooling & ducted heating
6.5 kw solar panels
High ceilings and plantation shutters throughout
Remote operated double garage.
Spacious low maintenance backyard. Let your kids & pets run freely in the safety of your backyard.
Inspection is must. Call today.
Photo ID Required Upon Inspection
Due diligence checklist - for home and residential property buyers - http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist.

While all care has been taken to ensure the information provided herein is correct, we do not take responsibility for any inaccuracies. Description:
Stunning Location, Supreme Comfort and Cool Living!
110 BLUEBELL DRIVE, CRAIGIEBURN
Zain Real Estate is proud to present this stunning, low maintenance, young and exciting home in one of the best spots of Craigieburn. This custom-built home is situated within walking distance to Public Transport, Newbury Primary School, Pelican Childcare, Hume Hockey Club & Eateries on Grand Boulevard.
This beautifully maintained home comprises of a fully functional floor plan containing a well-resourced kitchen with quality appliances, 3 spacious bedrooms featuring master with en-suite, walk-in robe & 2 good size bedrooms with built-In robes. The living zone consists of a formal lounge connected to a full thriving backyard and independent meals area.
Other features include:
**Ducted heating,
**Evaporative Cooling,
**Automatic garage with inside and rear access,
**Stainless steel kitchen appliances,
**Quality floorboards
**Well-presented floor plan
Call Ahmad Hashmi on 0423 646 730 for any further information.

Description:
A Perfect First Start
Located in the heart of a booming suburb and a stone through away from Craigieburn Central shopping centre, this well-presented home is very ideally situated. Close by to public transport, schools, parklands, walking trails and all of Craigieburn's in-demand amenities makes this property the perfect investment. Comprising of 3 bedrooms all with built in robes, large central bathroom, additional powder room, seperate laundry room, great size kitchen with adjoining meals and family room, alfresco area, LARGE backyard perfect for the kids to run around securely and more.
Additional features including double lock up garage with remote control and internal access, ducted heating, evaporative cooling just to highlight a few.
An inspection is A must to truly appreciate this beautiful home. Call Now To Arrange An Appointment.

Description:
The Perfect Start!
In a secluded cul-de-sac with Aitken Creek parkland at the end of the street with easy access to walking/cycling trails, Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, local schools and Craigieburn Golf Course. This beautiful single storey home delivers an exceptional low-maintenance lifestyle opportunity with its ideal design.
Featuring 3 bedrooms (master with full ensuite and all with BIR's), open plan living including good size kitchen with ample cupboard space that over looks meals and family area with access to an impressive outdoor decking entertaining area and plenty of space for the growing family to enjoy, main central bathroom, separate toilet, side driveway leading to a single garage with drive through & internal access.
Fixtures & fittings including: ducted heating, evaporative cooling, kitchen appliances, dishwasher, timber venetians, Cafe blinds and much more
*Harcourts Roxburgh Park Coronavirus Update*
In light of recent events, Harcourts Roxburgh Park have taken the appropriate measures to minimise the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak to our staff, clients and customers. As news concerning the spread of coronavirus continues to unfold, we are no longer conducting open for inspections and kindly ask that you DO NOT attend inspections, if:
* You are feeling unwell
* Have been in contact with someone diagnosed with coronavirus
* Have been in contact with someone who has recently been overseas
* You are under strict self-isolation instructions
* You have tested positive to coronavirus yourself
If attending inspections, please ensure you practice Social Distancing (minimum 1.5 metres) at all times, keeping in mind:
* Our agents will restrict the number of people inspecting the property to one person at any time.
* You refrain from touching surfaces, door handles, cupboards, drawers, walls, etc. when inspecting the property.
We appreciate your co-operation and ask that you please respect the advice and recommendations of the agent when inspecting the property.

Description:
LOCATION, COMFORT & EASY LIVING
Sahil Kakar & The Eleet Group are proud to present another marvellous, spacious & spectacular home in one of the most prominent location in Craigieburn at 20 Scarborough Tce.
This home provides you a free flowing floor plan inside & a bold look outside. In midst of spec homes this beauty was once a display home(The Mornington Display) which has preserved its glamour for past number of years. Exquisitely maintained, it has been a home to caring owners, therefore providing an excellent opportunity to a first home buyer, an investor or an upsizing family.
Sitting on an massive 575SQM land allotment, this sizeable 29sq home is a treat for any home buyer or investor. Only on the rarest occasion does an allotment offering such dramatic dimensions and irresistible potential become available in such rewarding context as this sought after location, here in the heart of Craigieburn. This grand location is walking distance to 4 top schools in vicinity of 850 metres to 2kms, 900 metres to Highland Shopping Centre & highlands hotel, 6 mins to Craigieburn Station & Craigieburn Central, 3 mins to Pelican child Care & 5 mins to Splash Aqua Park & Leisure Centre, making this an uncompromising location.
Boasting a sun drenched wide footage & sleek contemporary spaces, this immaculate home offers a stylish lifestyle.The residents can also enjoy 2 side entrance and exit from the lounge & dining area to the side and back yard. The fully decked alfresco at the back provides the best means for outdoor entertainment for small or large gatherings.
Overall the residence is equipped with quality fixtures and fittings throughout and is beautifully presented.
** Master Bedroom with Walk In Robe & a Sizeable En-suite
** Ducted Heating & Evaporative Cooling
** Seperate Study
** 5.5 Kw Solar Panels to avoid any shocks with increasing electricity prices
** Large spacious Kitchen with 900MM stainless steel appliances & plenty of quality cabinetry for storage
** Fully decked Large Alfresco area for outdoor entertainment accompanied by 4 roller mesh/weather sheet
** Foldable back yard entrance glass door
** Porcelain tiles matched with quality carpeting in bedrooms
** Automated Double Garage
** Wide 18M Frontage
** 8 CCTV Cameras for your security 24*7 & front entrance crime safe door
** Feature walls to uplift the ambience & beauty of the home
This opportunity gives you the dream home you always wanted & is not to be missed.
Call Sahil on 0401 926 466 to arrange an inspection as this wont last long.
DISCLAIMER: All stated dimensions are approximate only. Particulars given are for general information only and do not constitute any representation on the part of the vendor or agent.
Please see the below link for an up-to-date copy of the Due Diligence Check List: http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
Virtual Tours Available on Request

267m²
